duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead end-to-end client onboarding and implementation processes, working closely with clients to understand their unique needs, requirements, and workflows.
Provide exceptional technical support to clients, acting as the main point of contact for their inquiries, issues, and escalations.
Develop and nurture strong, trust-based relationships with clients, acting as a strategic partner and advisor to help them maximize the value of our solutions.
Lead a team of implementation managers and solutions engineers to deliver a great customer experience and get customers live efficiently, with robust integrations that scale well.
Collaborate closely with the sales team during the pre-sales phase to ensure a smooth transition from sales to implementation.
Contribute to the ongoing development of implementation and support processes, identifying areas for improvement and efficiency gains.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
